DynamicFeaturesType.title: DynamicFeatures
DynamicFeaturesType.description: Captures the dynamic features, i.e., those that are associated with the semantics of the executed code, of a malware instance. At least one of the "behavior_refs" or "action_refs" or "process_trees" MUST be inlcuded when using this type.

behavior_refs.description: Specifies a set of one or more Behaviors exhibited by the Malware Instance. Each item specifies the unique ID of the Behavior being referenced.

action_refs.description: Specifies a set of one or more Actions discovered for the Malware Instance. Each item specifies the unique ID of the Action being referenced.

process_tree.description: Specifies the Process Tree observed during the execution of the Malware Instance.
